channel.title: FroyoScape's Event Guy Idea
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][tt]FroyoScape's[/tt] Event Guy[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101015134025/runescape/images/thumb/4/44/Party_Pete.png/110px-Party_Pete.png[/img][/center]
Event guy will be featured in every town and he will contain each cities special 'event of the day'.
[center][b]Event Guy[/b][/center] Event guy is planned to be Party Pete.
[center][b]Lumbridge[/b][/center] Lumbridge will have special holidays such as the Duke's birth date and the President's birthday. There will be 'Woodcutting Contests' that take place at the Lumbridge-Draynor border.
[center][b]Varrock[/b][/center] Varrock will feature tournaments and the 'Meet the king' program. There will also be 'Last Guard Standing' contests where the Guard NPC will fight the Guard NPC and the last guard standing will be victorious!
[center][b]Falador[/b][/center] Falador will also feature tournaments, but more major ones. When there is a tournament, hatred is neautralized and everyone is neutral with Falador, except for Draynor who will still love Falador.
[center][b]Ardougne[/b][/center] Ardougne will also feature a 'Last Guard Standing' contest, but the ardougne guards are more powerful, thus, making this tournament more major.
[center][b]Camelot[/b][/center] Camelot will have no events besides Woodcutting Contests.
[center][b]Catherby[/b][/center] Catherby will have no events besides Fishing Contests.
[center][b]Draynor[/b][/center] Draynor will have a Woodcutting Contest and a Fishing contest. Draynor will also feature the 'Pick the Cabbage!' contest and the 'Kill the Vampire!' event. The 'Kill the Vampire' event is just a monster that is spawned called a Vampire and it drops fair loot.
[center][b]Neutral Cities[/b][/center] Neutral cities (besides Draynor) will not have any events.
[center][b]Holidays[/b][/center] During the holidays, all cities will love each other. This is to provide friendship and equality.

item.title: FroyoScape's Event Guy Idea
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:6, topic:478769”]Cool.
Will there be players in charge of hosting these events, or will there be actual NPC’s managing it?
Will there be rewards?
Will there be an announcement throughout the game when there is an event being hosted?

Sorry for all of the questions, my curiosity gets the best of me. ;)[/quote]
I will decide in time.

And I appreciate questions. They make this idea much more broader.

EDIT:

Will there be players in charge of hosting these events, or will there be actual NPC's managing it?
Still thinking...
Will there be rewards?
Yes. The reward is depending on what city you came from and how difficult the event is.
Will there be an announcement throughout the game when there is an event being hosted?
Yes there will be.
Null Amount:

I have a feeling Froyo is gonna’ be good. Keep it up, Arham.

Haha. Hopefully.

Bump

Read full topic

@Flame3 wrote:

Cool.
Will there be players in charge of hosting these events, or will there be actual NPC’s managing it?
Will there be rewards?
Will there be an announcement throughout the game when there is an event being hosted?

Sorry for all of the questions, my curiosity gets the best of me.

item.title: FroyoScape's Event Guy Idea
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:4, topic:478769”]Another home run idea, Arham.
Are these ideas simply concepts at the moment, or are you actually putting these into affect?[/quote]
They are pretty much easy to add. The government idea has the base gone through and this idea, well, I just thought of it when i was thinking about the Party Room.

Read full topic

Sounds fantastic, I love this project.

They are fairly easy ideas to add but are nice (in my opinion, your guys decision to say if it’s nice or not) features that build up.

[center][size=24pt][tt]FroyoScape’s[/tt] Event Guy[/size][/center]

[center][/center]

Event guy will be featured in every town and he will contain each cities special ‘event of the day’.

[center]Event Guy[/center]
Event guy is planned to be Party Pete.

[center]Lumbridge[/center]
Lumbridge will have special holidays such as the Duke’s birth date and the President’s birthday. There will be ‘Woodcutting Contests’ that take place at the Lumbridge-Draynor border.

[center]Varrock[/center]
Varrock will feature tournaments and the ‘Meet the king’ program. There will also be ‘Last Guard Standing’ contests where the Guard NPC will fight the Guard NPC and the last guard standing will be victorious!

[center]Falador[/center]
Falador will also feature tournaments, but more major ones. When there is a tournament, hatred is neautralized and everyone is neutral with Falador, except for Draynor who will still love Falador.

[center]Ardougne[/center]
Ardougne will also feature a ‘Last Guard Standing’ contest, but the ardougne guards are more powerful, thus, making this tournament more major.

[center]Camelot[/center]
Camelot will have no events besides Woodcutting Contests.

[center]Catherby[/center]
Catherby will have no events besides Fishing Contests.

[center]Draynor[/center]
Draynor will have a Woodcutting Contest and a Fishing contest. Draynor will also feature the ‘Pick the Cabbage!’ contest and the ‘Kill the Vampire!’ event. The ‘Kill the Vampire’ event is just a monster that is spawned called a Vampire and it drops fair loot.

[center]Neutral Cities[/center]
Neutral cities (besides Draynor) will not have any events.

During the holidays, all cities will love each other. This is to provide friendship and equality.
